title: Can someone out there please tell me which font this is?
content:
I was hoping someone out there can tell me what font this is? It's on a friends shitty logo that needs editing

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen Shot 2013-03-21 at 7.51.54 PM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023213210/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-03-21%20at%207.51.54%20PM.png) | 8.12 KB |
author: lewiep

comments.content: It is Eurostile that has been distorted by extending the width.
